channel.title: Crucial Moment, Where The Elite Play
channel.description:
[img]http://imgur.com/SqSHK6D[/img]
Welcome To Crucial Moment[BETA.] Come join us today! [URL=http://crucialmomentrsps.enjin.com/home][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/42281647/ad/playnow.png[/img][/URL] - All Godwars Bosses with real kill count and frozen keys! - 100% Quest And Task's - Achievment diary's! - 100% Summoning - Crucible - Mature Community - Active Owner & Dev's - Active Pk'ing - PVM That Never Gets Boring! - Fully Stable Economy Server - Items Kept on Death (Except Wilderness) - Custom BuyAble Loot Beams! - Custom Comp Cape Requirments.
Great Economy
Nomad!
Dragonbone Armor Only The Elite Who Slay The Queen Can Accuire This Gear
Squeal of Fortune
24/7 DEDI Hosting
Polypore Dungeon
100% Clanwars
100% Castle Wars
Custom Real Dungeoneering
Fun Daily Events
Nomad
Polypore Dung
Runespan (fully working)
All Drygore Weapons Kalphite King (50% added)
And Tons More, Along With Daily Updates! Join TODAY@ http://crucialmomentrsps.enjin.com/
¤Media of Crucial Moment¤ These Still Need To Be Updated. [IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7v.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7m.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7P.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ89.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ8d.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ8h.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7U.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7E.jpeg[/img]
¤Finished Updates¤
[B]-New Ranks
-No Dupes
-New Boss
-3 custom armors
-Donator only bosses (drops elite void)
-New Items and Npc For Shops
-Most to all of hidden shops disabled/gone
-Fixed Lots of bugged random shops around world
-Added new commands
-Fixed Nex Bugs
-Fixed Donor shops
-Almost fully fixed sof
-Added Onyx Bolts to shops
-Moderator+ Panel
-Starters Added
-Buffed Glacors
-Lowered Drop Rates on Glacors
-Fixed Yell Bugs
-Added Barrelchest
-Switched Sources
-New Home on the New source
-Fixed Altars
-Ckey Chest Added
-New Shops
-Fixed Exp Rates
-Fixed Comp Cape
-Added Skiller Shop
-Added a way to get to Clanwars
-Fully Added Rune Span
-New BackGround
Started Updates
-V.I.P Rank
-Extreme Donator Rank/Zone
-Working on 100% Drygores
Not Started Updates
-Daily Task System w/ Rewards
-Stealing Creation [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/2198110_orig.jpg[/img]
